description: Glentoran start their bid for the Irish Cup with a 4-2 comeback win over east Belfast neighbours H&W Welders at Blanchflower Stadium.
title: Irish Cup: Glens fight back to beat Welders in fifth round
title_page: Irish Cup: Glens fight back to beat Welders in fifth round  - BBC Sport
